author: Victor Alvarado
comment: Disappointed. App installs on watch but for my life cannot open it on phone to manage images. Shows up with other apps in my system, but doesn't show up with my main apps. I don't think it installs properly.

author: Jody Hertel
comment: App only appears in Google "my apps", not on my phone, so no way to open it. Even under the Google "my apps" there is no "open" button, so absolutely useless to install if I can't open it to use it.

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hello Jody, this is not an application for Android, this is a WatchFace for Android Wear. You can't open the app without installing Android Wear in your device, and it will be useless if you don't have any Android wear.

Can you please edit your comment if you have Android Wear installed, Wear connected, and app still not showing ?

title: Don't bother

author: Andrew
comment: Best one so far. Only "issue" is the hour of 12 does not show when on 12hr format. Shows "00". Can that be fixed?

author: brodie Yg
comment: Crashes when I select an image
title: Not working

author: Miles Campbell
comment: Let's me select a picture from my  gallery but it doesn't appear on my Huawei watch. Sort this and it'll  be awesome..

author: Aidan H
comment: Love it! Just what I wanted! Nice and simple with a lot of customization options.

author: Jerome Thinnes
comment: This is one of the best watch faces I have found.

author: Danylo Voloshyn
comment: Best watch face with the most customization

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hi Arik, thanks for your comment.
What do you mean by "refining" ?

author: Anthony Stéphan
comment: Super watchface, beaucoup d'options pour personnaliser à son goût !
title: Superbe
